content: @Rishi Gupta Looking at all of the available default messages in templates/zerver/home.html, is it worth adding documentation links for all possible messages, or only stars & mentions?
For example, the "You have no private messages yet!" messages might be a good opportunity to link to the private messages doc? Unless you had something else in mind for these enhancements
if there are others we should definitely consider linking! In new realms nowadays you'll never have no private messages, since you start with a PM from welcome bot. Are there others?

You have no private messages with this person yet!
Nothing's been sent here yet!
You have no private messages with these people yet!
You aren't subscribed to this stream and nobody has talked about that yet!
You are not subscribed to this stream.
Nobody has talked about that yet!
Some others that might be worth linking?

hm, none of these seem that compelling to me. For the first three and for "nobody has talked about that yet", the user just needs to send a message, which they should know how to do by then (we emphasize it in our onboarding now).
And for the stream subscription one, I think we should just show the stream messages with a subscribe button.
Good idea though, to look through home.html!
Alright, will look into implementing stars/mentions only then
@Rishi Gupta Is #6378 what you had in mind? Would appreciate a review on it :)
yup! maybe a bit more vertical space, and centered? Also I think writing out the actual URL might be good here.
Should I do the same for all the "Why not start a conversation?" messages that follow the same format or no?
those are already centered, right? In terms of the URL they are not really URLs in the traditional sense; they are click targets controlled by javascript.
No, don't think so
Because I used the exact same formatting that "why not" had
why not?
Screenshot-at-Sep-01-22-45-03.png yep not centered

I was thinking of
pasted image
ah, I think brock has an open PR that fixes that one :).
Which one?
the private messages one
I was asking about what was the PR link that he opened for fixing that bug, sorry for not being clear
Yeah I can't find the PR you seem to be referencing, #5163 doesn't seem to be it
ah, got it :). I could be wrong about it being a PR then, could just be a branch, or maybe that change never made it. It would be great to just fix this one with the rest, then!
Screenshot-at-Sep-01-22-58-52.png now matches the same formatting that "Nothing's been sent here yet" has
And screenshot doesn't show it but links have been updated
awesome!
Thanks for the review, amended commit
This is a great idea, @Cynthia Lin!
I realized this is old news, but yeah, this is a great improvement.
